entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
